events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a vehicle collision resulting in damage to the car’s front bumper.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and vehicle involved.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage the claim and handle all future communications.
The customer was informed that the claim has been formally acknowledged and entered into the system.
Request sent to customer for photos of the damaged vehicle and police accident report to proceed.
Customer provided all requested documents including detailed pictures and official accident report.
Investigator initiated examination of the claim and scheduled an inspection of the vehicle damage.
Completed the damage assessment and verified the circumstances of the vehicle collision.
A settlement offer was proposed based on damage evaluation and policy coverage limits.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the process.
Claim approved officially, confirming payment will proceed according to agreed terms.
Payment for the vehicle repair claim was issued to the customer’s designated bank account.
The claim was formally closed after completion of payment and confirmation of repair initiation.
